law.history: Repealed 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 105, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-14.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Traffic in alcoholic beverage on election day local option election held prohibited.
